verses.verse: לָ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why רָגְשׁ֣וּ <S%H7283><s%> rage גוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> Why do the heathen וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> and the people יֶהְגּוּ־ <S%H1897><s%> imagine רִֽיק׃ <S%H7385><s%> A vain

יִ֥תְיַצְּב֨וּ ׀ <S%H3320><s%> set מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> The kings אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְרוֹזְנִ֥ים <S%H7336><s%> themselves and the rulers נֽוֹסְדוּ־ <S%H3245><s%> take counsel יָ֑חַד <S%H3162><s%> together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against יְ֝הוָה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against מְשִׁיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H4899><s%> and against his anointed

נְֽ֭נַתְּקָה <S%H5423><s%> asunder אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֽוֹסְרוֹתֵ֑ימוֹ <S%H4147><s%> their bands וְנַשְׁלִ֖יכָה <S%H7993><s%> and cast away מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at עֲבֹתֵֽימוֹ׃ <S%H5688><s%> their cords

יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> He that sitteth בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens יִשְׂחָ֑ק <S%H7832><s%> shall laugh אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יִלְעַג־ <S%H3932><s%> shall have them in derision לָֽמוֹ׃

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> Then shall he speak אֵלֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H413><s%> to בְאַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> unto them in his wrath וּֽבַחֲרוֹנ֥וֹ <S%H2740><s%> them in his sore displeasure יְבַהֲלֵֽמוֹ׃ <S%H926><s%> and vex

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> I נָסַ֣כְתִּי <S%H5258><s%> Yet have I set מַלְכִּ֑י <S%H4428><s%> my king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> hill קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> upon my holy

אֲסַפְּרָ֗ה <S%H5608><s%> I will declare אֶֽ֫ל <S%H413><s%> of חֹ֥ק <S%H2706><s%> the decree יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God אָמַ֘ר <S%H559><s%> hath said אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me בְּנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto me Thou [art] my Son אַ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you אֲ֝נִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day יְלִדְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H3205><s%> have I begotten

שְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> Ask מִמֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> will surely וְאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> of me and I shall give ג֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> [thee] the heathen נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5159><s%> [for] thine inheritance וַ֝אֲחֻזָּתְךָ֗ <S%H272><s%> [for] thy possession אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> and the uttermost parts אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

תְּ֭רֹעֵם <S%H7489><s%> Thou shalt break בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> them with a rod בַּרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron כִּכְלִ֖י <S%H3627><s%> vessel יוֹצֵ֣ר <S%H3335><s%> like a potter's תְּנַפְּצֵֽם׃ <S%H5310><s%> thou shalt dash them in pieces

וְ֭עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> now therefore O ye kings הַשְׂכִּ֑ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> Be wise הִ֝וָּסְר֗וּ <S%H3256><s%> be instructed שֹׁ֣פְטֵי <S%H8199><s%> ye judges אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth
עִבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> Serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּיִרְאָ֑ה <S%H3374><s%> with fear וְ֝גִ֗ילוּ <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice בִּרְעָדָֽה׃ <S%H7461><s%> with trembling

נַשְּׁקוּ־ <S%H5401><s%> Kiss בַ֡ר <S%H1248><s%> the Son פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> not יֶאֱנַ֤ף ׀ <S%H599><s%> lest he be angry וְתֹ֬אבְדוּ <S%H6><s%> and ye perish דֶ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [from] the way כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִבְעַ֣ר <S%H1197><s%> is kindled כִּמְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> but a little אַפּ֑וֹ <S%H639><s%> when his wrath אַ֝שְׁרֵ֗י <S%H835><s%> Blessed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> are all ח֥וֹסֵי <S%H2620><s%> [are] all they that put their trust בֽוֹ׃
